Acknowledgements¶

The Roundup Initative is a group of people that regularily works together to produce new releases of the Roundup Issue Tracker. We like to thank our community and all organisation and people that support us doing so with code, money, time, testing, reports, ideas and everything else that helped!

Announcement with changelog for current release.

pre 1.5.0¶

Go Ping, you rock! Also, go Common Ground, ekit.com and Bizar Software for letting me implement this system on their time.
